description:
READ CAREFULLY:

The second wave of this fear-mongering bullshit has began 3 weeks ago. European countries are beginning to tighten restrictions and close businesses such as nightclubs, just because there has been a second spike of this 'DeAdLy' virus which has a mortality rate of < 1%. The way it is going is not right at all. In the next month or 2, UK and other european countries could go back into lockdown like what has happened in New Zealand and Victoria, Australia, which will further damage the economy and our mental health. SO, FUCKING LIBTARDS, IF YOU THINK THAT WEARING A MASK AND DOING A 2ND LOCKDOWN SAVES LIVES, THEN YOU NEED TO FUCKING EDUCATE YOURSELF BEFORE IT IS FUCKING TOO LATE AND PLEASE CHECK OUT MY STORY HIGHLIGHT - 'THE TRUTH'. WAKE THE FUCK UP!
